This email is from outside the Group. Be AWARE, Please do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. Forward suspicious emails to itsupport 



Hi Michela,

 

Wednesday’s are the day of the update. So I just sent them, so usually it comes after your call.

I send you the beans now, because it was last week.

 

Regards,

 

Bastien

Kind regards,

Michela
